long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
[RICOH PJ Interactive Setup Software]

This Setup Application is for RICOH PJ Interactive device user.

RICOH PJ Interactive enable to make all kinds of display as touch display.

So, you have to set the mode(pen or finger touch), language, option, model(UST,ST,NT), screen alignment and Calibration through the Setup App before using RICOH PJ Interactive.

This is only need first time installation, and donâ€™t have to set it up every time you use it.
